Field.Hint: The text that is spoken by the actor.

Field.Value: As a Sales Manager, your role is to check and verify the documents then send them to your colleagues for further processing.

Field.Hint: The text that is spoken by the actor.

Field.Hint: The title of this dialogue.

Field.Hint: The text that is spoken by the actor.
Field.Title: Dialogue Text
Field.Value: I am looking for a personal loan.

Field.Hint: A WMV video file to be played for this dialogue.
Field.Title: Video File

Field.Hint: Dialogue System for Unity cutscene sequence
Field.Title: Sequence

Field.Hint: The title of this dialogue.
Field.Title: Title

Field.Hint: The actor who is talking.
Field.Title: Actor

Field.Hint: The actor who is listening.
Field.Title: Conversant

Field.Hint: The text that is displayed to the player in a list as a dialogue option.
Field.Title: Menu Text

Field.Hint: The text that is spoken by the actor.
Field.Title: Dialogue Text
Field.Value: Are you looking for a personal loan? If yes then I would recommend this Unsecured Loan package that our ORP bank is currently offering. We offer premium interest rates that you will enjoy.

Field.Hint: A WMV video file to be played for this dialogue.
Field.Title: Video File

Field.Hint: Dialogue System for Unity cutscene sequence
Field.Title: Sequence

Field.Hint: The title of this dialogue.
Field.Title: Title

Field.Hint: The actor who is talking.
Field.Title: Actor

Field.Hint: The actor who is listening.
Field.Title: Conversant

Field.Hint: The text that is displayed to the player in a list as a dialogue option.
Field.Title: Menu Text

Field.Hint: The text that is spoken by the actor.
Field.Title: Dialogue Text
Field.Value: This sounds excellent. I'm looking for a loan of SGD 20,000. Please tell me what are your interest rate options that you can offer and related terms and conditions.

Field.Hint: A WMV video file to be played for this dialogue.
Field.Title: Video File

Field.Hint: Dialogue System for Unity cutscene sequence
Field.Title: Sequence

Field.Hint: The title of this dialogue.
Field.Title: Title

Field.Hint: The actor who is talking.
Field.Title: Actor

Field.Hint: The actor who is listening.
Field.Title: Conversant

Field.Hint: The text that is displayed to the player in a list as a dialogue option.
Field.Title: Menu Text

Field.Hint: The text that is spoken by the actor.
Field.Title: Dialogue Text
Field.Value: We are offering unsecured loans for up to SGD 20,000 at 3% p.a. payable over a five year period. Does this meet your requirements?

Field.Hint: A WMV video file to be played for this dialogue.
Field.Title: Video File

Field.Hint: Dialogue System for Unity cutscene sequence
Field.Title: Sequence

Field.Hint: The title of this dialogue.
Field.Title: Title

Field.Hint: The actor who is talking.
Field.Title: Actor

Field.Hint: The actor who is listening.
Field.Title: Conversant

Field.Hint: The text that is displayed to the player in a list as a dialogue option.
Field.Title: Menu Text

Field.Hint: The text that is spoken by the actor.
Field.Title: Dialogue Text
Field.Value: Thanks this is helpful. Can you email me the details at kevin1@singtel.com and I will revert in a couple of hours. How long will it take for you to approve and disburse the loan?

Field.Hint: A WMV video file to be played for this dialogue.
Field.Title: Video File

Field.Value: Within one working day. Have a nice day Sir.

Field.Value: Check out the documents on your table. Your main role is to process and verify those documents that come to you and sign them off before you send them to your colleague.

Field.Hint: The text that is spoken by the actor.
Field.Title: Dialogue Text
Field.Value: Your additional role will also be to have the control of the firesafe, which is located in the Loan Manager's Office. You hold one of the two keys required to unlock the safe for depositing documents when required.
